sqlMap.insert:
INSERT /*MS-YRD-F-COUNCIL-APPLY-RISK-HANDLE-INSERT*/ INTO f_council_apply_risk_handle(apply_id,form_id,project_code,project_name,customer_id,customer_name,is_repay,company_name,enterprise_type,guarantee_amount,guarantee_rate,guarantee_rate_type,loan_bank,loan_time_limit,busi_manager_name,risk_manager_name,repay_amount,repay_date,loan_type,credit_time_limit,credit_amount,basic_info,risk_info,last_council_decision,last_council_check,this_council_scheme,status,raw_add_time) VALUES (#applyId#, #formId#, #projectCode#, #projectName#, #customerId#, #customerName#, #isRepay#, #companyName#,#enterpriseType#, #guaranteeAmount#, #guaranteeRate#, #guaranteeRateType#, #loanBank#, #loanTimeLimit#, #busiManagerName#, #riskManagerName#, #repayAmount#, #repayDate#, #loanType#, #creditTimeLimit#, #creditAmount#, #basicInfo#, #riskInfo#, #lastCouncilDecision#, #lastCouncilCheck#, #thisCouncilScheme#, #status#, #rawAddTime#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
sqlMap.update: update /*MS-YRD-F-COUNCIL-APPLY-RISK-HANDLE-UPDATE*/ f_council_apply_risk_handle set apply_id=#applyId#, form_id=#formId#, project_code=#projectCode#, project_name=#projectName#, customer_id=#customerId#, customer_name=#customerName#, is_repay=#isRepay#, company_name=#companyName#, enterprise_type=#enterpriseType#, guarantee_amount=#guaranteeAmount.cent#, guarantee_rate=#guaranteeRate#, guarantee_rate_type=#guaranteeRateType#, loan_bank=#loanBank#, loan_time_limit=#loanTimeLimit#, busi_manager_name=#busiManagerName#, risk_manager_name=#riskManagerName#, repay_amount=#repayAmount.cent#, repay_date=#repayDate#, loan_type=#loanType#, credit_time_limit=#creditTimeLimit#, credit_amount=#creditAmount.cent#, basic_info=#basicInfo#, risk_info=#riskInfo#, last_council_decision=#lastCouncilDecision#, last_council_check=#lastCouncilCheck#, this_council_scheme=#thisCouncilScheme#, status=#status# where (id = #id#)

update /*MS-YRD-F-COUNCIL-APPLY-RISK-HANDLE-UPDATE-BY-FORM-ID*/ f_council_apply_risk_handle set apply_id=#applyId#, project_code=#projectCode#, project_name=#projectName#, customer_id=#customerId#, customer_name=#customerName#, is_repay=#isRepay#, company_name=#companyName#, enterprise_type=#enterpriseType#, guarantee_amount=#guaranteeAmount.cent#, guarantee_rate=#guaranteeRate#, guarantee_rate_type=#guaranteeRateType#, loan_bank=#loanBank#, loan_time_limit=#loanTimeLimit#, busi_manager_name=#busiManagerName#, risk_manager_name=#riskManagerName#, repay_amount=#repayAmount.cent#, repay_date=#repayDate#, loan_type=#loanType#, credit_time_limit=#creditTimeLimit#, credit_amount=#creditAmount.cent#, basic_info=#basicInfo#, risk_info=#riskInfo#, last_council_decision=#lastCouncilDecision#, last_council_check=#lastCouncilCheck#, this_council_scheme=#thisCouncilScheme#, status=#status# where (form_id = #formId#)

update /*MS-YRD-F-COUNCIL-APPLY-RISK-HANDLE-UPDATE-BY-APPLY-ID*/ f_council_apply_risk_handle set form_id=#formId#, project_code=#projectCode#, project_name=#projectName#, customer_id=#customerId#, customer_name=#customerName#, is_repay=#isRepay#, company_name=#companyName#, enterprise_type=#enterpriseType#, guarantee_amount=#guaranteeAmount.cent#, guarantee_rate=#guaranteeRate#, guarantee_rate_type=#guaranteeRateType#, loan_bank=#loanBank#, loan_time_limit=#loanTimeLimit#, busi_manager_name=#busiManagerName#, risk_manager_name=#riskManagerName#, repay_amount=#repayAmount.cent#, repay_date=#repayDate#, loan_type=#loanType#, credit_time_limit=#creditTimeLimit#, credit_amount=#creditAmount.cent#, basic_info=#basicInfo#, risk_info=#riskInfo#, last_council_decision=#lastCouncilDecision#, last_council_check=#lastCouncilCheck#, this_council_scheme=#thisCouncilScheme#, status=#status# where (apply_id = #applyId#)
